1604065900_mirrored_differs_github.body:
Are you using a vpn?
Also check your OS proxy settings.
And your browser proxy settings.

1604066052_mirrored_DaniellMesquita_gith.body: Having a settings for ZeroNet can help these types of stuff.
There is the Config now. It can be put there.

1604066189_mirrored_Ornataweaver_github.body: I know it seems so, but Wappalyzer does not prevent any other site from loading. Or maybe because I'm familiar with ZeroNet environment I don't know other websites when they are affected.

1604066266_mirrored_JumpCricket_github.body: @JumpCricket I didn't say that to you my friend.
@JumpCricket Your writing is very clear. I understand what you mean easily.

1604066444_mirrored_Ornataweaver_github.body:
It takes so much energy to focus the mouse on the zero again then instead of clicking it, one has to drag it.
It takes so much time.

topic.title: Scrolling sidebar is interrupted by Globe scroll in sidebar, would you disable zooming of the Globe?
topic.body: When I drag the ZeroNet icon in every website to reach the sidebar of that site, when I try to scroll down or up, the Globe zooms in and out and prevents scrolling properly. Would you disable zooming of the Globe by mouse? It has a low resolution so zooming into it is a useless feature anyway.

topic.title: Wappalyzer chrome extension prevents ZN sites from loading until I click on it's button.
topic.body:
My browser is Iridium: https://alternativeto.net/software/iridium/
After clicking the extension button in the menubar the site starts loading.
I need Wappalyzer for studying the web and learning front-end coding.

topic.title: When 0 is dragged left, you must drag it back right to get back to the site.
topic.body: Let the user just click anywhere on the page, out of the side-menu, to close it.

topic.title: Option to view upload/download bandwidth of ZeroNet at the moment.
topic.body: When I lunch ZeroNet it slows down my connection. And it's confusing whether it's this or another software.

topic.title: Suggestion: Add the option to disable the globe in config
topic.body:
I use the menu many time, the globe slows this down.
Repeated slowing of it has become bothering.

If this option is activated, instead of a globe we see a button saying "Show Globe".
You can avoid putting the option in the config at all, and simply turn the globe to the button for everyone.
